mapper.select: SELECT /* */ REG_DATE AS regDate /* */ , TELEMSG_NO AS telemsgNo /* */ , ORIDELNG_DE AS oridelngDe /* */ , ORITELEMSG_NO AS oritelemsgNo /* */ , PROCESS_RESULT_INQIRE_SE AS processResultInqireSe /* */ , ORIDELNG_RSPNS_CODE AS oridelngRspnsCode /* */ , ORIDELNG_PROCESS_TIME AS oridelngProcessTime /* */ , DEFRAY_ACNUT_NO AS defrayAcnutNo /* */ , VIRTL_ACNUT_NO AS virtlAcnutNo /* */ , DELNG_AMOUNT AS delngAmount /* */ , BLCE_SMBOL AS blceSmbol /* */ , BLCE AS blce /* */ , THRGH_ACNUT_NO1 AS thrghAcnutNo1 /* */ , THRGH_ACNUT_NO2 AS thrghAcnutNo2 /* */ , BANK_CODE AS bankCode /* */ , ACNUT_NO AS acnutNo /* */ , IR_SAF_SE AS irSafSe /* */ , FEE AS fee /* */ , CMS_CODE AS cmsCode /* */ , DEFRAY_ACNUT_PRNTXT AS defrayAcnutPrntxt /* */ , THRGH_ACNUT1_RCPMNY_PRNTXT AS thrghAcnut1RcpmnyPrntxt /* */ , THRGH_ACNUT1_DEFRAY_PRNTXT AS thrghAcnut1DefrayPrntxt /* */ , THRGH_ACNUT2_RCPMNY_PRNTXT AS thrghAcnut2RcpmnyPrntxt /* */ , THRGH_ACNUT2_DEFRAY_PRNTXT AS thrghAcnut2DefrayPrntxt /* */ , RCPMNY_ACNUT_PRNTXT AS rcpmnyAcnutPrntxt /* */ , CINET_DELNG_INNB AS cinetDelngInnb /* */ , RSPNS_CODE AS rspnsCode /* */ , RSPNS_MSSAGE AS rspnsMssage /* */ , SEND_YN AS sendYn /* */ FROM T0400100 WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DATE = #{regDate} AND SEND_YN = #{sendYn}
